column17:
Starryville nursery and primary school was established on the 9th of October, 1996 by an experienced educationist.

Its is located in a safe, quiet and serene neighbourhood in the center of Ifako-Ijaiye in Lagos state at Joseph Campbell Avenue, Alex Kehinde Taylor Estate.

It is an exclusive, well equipped, result-oriented school that adopts a pragmatic approach to learning. We have qualified, dedicated and disciplined teachers. Our classrooooms are spacious, well ventilated with comfortable furniture and a maximum of 20students/class.

We make use of modern instructional aids as welll as modified montessori method for teaching. Our students are also involved in extra-curricular activities such as music, arts, swimming, ballet dancing, etc.

Our playground is safe, and ample toys are available for leisure and recreation
